title: Little Mix promise to NEVER split up after enjoying a “few bevvies” at the BRIT Awards
text:
Little Mix promise to NEVER split up after enjoying a “few bevvies” at the BRIT Awards Jesy Nelson was in high spirits after triumphant Brits win Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Boozy Little Mix pledge to stay together in chaotic interview Share this video     
Little Mix were the stars of the show at the BRIT Awards last night. 
They opened the show with a flawless rendition of Shout Out To My Ex and then scooped the award for Best British Single . 
So you can’t blame the girls for having a “few bevvies” to celebrate their triumphant night. 
And after their win the girls certainly seemed to be in high spirits as Jesy Nelson promised the band will “never split”. Little Mix were in high spirits after their BRITs win (Photo: Twitter/@beboxmusic) 
“I’ve had a few bevvies but I don’t really care because I’m having the best night of my life,” Jesy admitted. 
Later, she added: “I don’t want to be a cheese ball but I literally love these girls more than anything in my whole entire life,” Jesy said. 
“We’re never splitting up ever.” They couldn't believe they'd won (Photo: Twitter/@beboxmusic) 
Her bandmates agreed and then broke into an altered rendition of Taylor Swift's We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together. 
The girls were in disbelief after their big win. 
“We can’t believe we’ve just won a Brit,” Leigh-Anne said. Jesy promised the band would never split up (Photo: Twitter/@beboxmusic) 
Talking about her acceptance speech, Jade said: “They just threw me under the bus, we had a speech prepared and they just went ‘no we’re not talking’”. 
Perrie admitted: “We were practising our humble faces and well what do you know, we won.” 
Mirror Online have contacted Little Mix’s rep for a comment. Like us on Facebook
